ComicInfo.Title: The Vampire of Prague and Dr. Carp's Experiment
ComicInfo.Series: Hellboy: The Vampire of Prague and Dr. Carp's Experiment
ComicInfo.Summary:
Fans of the world's greatest paranormal detective can find two of the best Hellboy stories to date in this set of short stories from Hellboy: The Troll Witch and Others and The Dark Horse Book of Hauntings, featuring work by comics legends P. Craig Russell and Mike Mignola.
The Vampire of Prague. If you play cards with the dead you get cursed and roam the streets untill you're faced with Hellboy.
Dr. Carp's Experiment. Hellboy visits a haunted house in Long Island (NY).
